Ghosthouse.1988.Uncut.DvdRip.Xvid.Video-Man	Death holds the mortgage, and if you move in...they&#039;ll be Hell to pay.

Also Known As:
Evil Dead 3 (Italy) (informal alternative title) 
Ghosthouse (USA)
According to producer &#039;Joe d&#039;Amato&#039; , the film was a commercial success mainly because of Achille Manzotti&#039;s idea to change the title from "Ghosthouse" to "La Casa 3" ("La Casa 1" and "2" being the Italian titles for Sam Raimi&#039;s The Evil Dead (1981) and Evil Dead II (1987)).

Visions of a deceased girl and her doll bring doom to the visitors of a deserted 
house.

Cast
(Cast overview, first billed only)
    Lara Wendel    ...     Martha
    Greg Scott    ...     Paul

As with any Umberto Lenzi film I wasn&#039;t expecting much but with "Ghosthouse" I was pleasantly surprised. Where else can you see such an off-the-wall haunted house movie with a demonic little girl, an evil clown doll, Harvey Keitel look alike Donald o&#039; Brien as a slasher maniac, acid milk baths, flying stuffed animals, bizarre nursery rhymes, a disappearing Doberman Pincer, zombies, and other bits of general weirdness? Just wish the acting and storyline wasn&#039;t so poor.
